name: Wind Stag
text_description: The Wind Stag has the swiftness of the breeze and the power of the forest. Each time Wind Stag attacks, it gains +1 speed for the next turn.
illustration_description: A majestic stag stands tall, wind swirling around it and leaves rustling beneath its hooves. Its antlers seem to merge with the trees of the verdant forest backdrop. Its eyes gleam with resolve and the power of nature.
